page.title: 18Bideford:S+SE.Churchill Rd.
page.content: There are 143 houses in Churchill Rd.. It is a council owned estate which is terraced.Some tenants have bought their houses and fenced off the front gardens The pub is called the Barton and is the local meeting place.Much singing and sh -outing can be heard coming from here very late on Friday and Sat nights.Opp- osite on Chubb Rd.is A.M.P.a factory wh ich makes electrical components for ind They had an open day on 22 June as part of the 21 anniversary celebrations and over 600 people attended.Free gifts we- re given away and there were many disp- lays and demonstrations.On Alverdiscott Rd are other factories:these include At -las Pencil Co.for which my mother does Â£out work'of cleaning and capping cosm- etic pencils,Leisure Industries at whi- ch there was a fire a couple of weeks ago,which makes snooker tables,&Torrid- ge Autos where my boy friend's fath.wks
